Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Directs the attorney general to review incidents where a civilian is killed by a police officer
Summary: Directs the attorney general to review incidents where a civilian is killed by a police officer.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to the authority of the attorney general to review incidents where a civilian is killed by a police officer
